title: Beck earns track MVP, Tech men place second at ACC outdoor championships - VT hokiesports.com
content: Beck earns track MVP, Tech men place second at ACC outdoor championships  VT hokiesports.com
description: Cole Beck of Virginia Tech visited the podium three times on Saturday en route to winning the men's most valuable performer on the track at the 2022 ACC Outdoor Track and Field Championships at Morris Williams Stadium on the campus of Duke University. He became the first Hokie to win the award at the outdoor meet.
